summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_UNORDERED_ACCESS_VIEW_DESC structure that is initialized with a structure.

param.name: o
param.para: Type: const
Address of the structure that initializes the CD3D11_UNORDERED_ACCESS_VIEW_DESC structure.

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_UNORDERED_ACCESS_VIEW_DESC structure that is initialized with values.

param.name: viewDimension
param.para: Type:
A -typed value that specifies the resource type of the view.

param.name: format
param.para: Type:
A -typed value that specifies the viewing format.

param.name: mipSlice
param.para: Type: UINT
The index of the mipmap level to use mip slice. FirstElement for .

param.name: firstArraySlice
param.para: Type: UINT
The index of the first element to use in an array of elements.
NumElements for . FirstWSlice for .

param.name: arraySize
param.para: Type: UINT
Number of elements in the array. WSize for .

param.name: flags
param.para: Type: UINT
A -typed value that identifies view options for a buffer. For only.

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_UNORDERED_ACCESS_VIEW_DESC structure that is initialized with D3D11_BUFFER_UAV values.

param.name: unnamedParam1
param.para: A pointer to a ID3D11Buffer interface for a buffer.

param.name: format
param.para: A DXGI_FORMAT-typed value that specifies the viewing format.

param.name: firstElement
param.para: Number of bytes between the beginning of the buffer and the first element to access.

param.name: numElements
param.para: Total number of elements in the view.

param.name: flags
param.para: A D3D11_BUFFER_UAV_FLAG-typed value that identifies view options for a buffer.

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_UNORDERED_ACCESS_VIEW_DESC structure that is initialized with D3D11_TEX1D_UAV or D3D11_TEX1D_ARRAY_UAV values.

param.name: pTex1D
param.para: A pointer to a ID3D11Texture1D interface for a 1D texture.

param.name: viewDimension
param.para: A D3D11_UAV_DIMENSION-typed value that specifies the resource type of the view.

param.name: format
param.para: A DXGI_FORMAT-typed value that specifies the viewing format.

param.name: mipSlice
param.para: The index of the mipmap level to use mip slice.

param.name: firstArraySlice
param.para: The index of the first element to use in an array of elements.

param.name: arraySize
param.para: Number of elements in the array.

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_UNORDERED_ACCESS_VIEW_DESC structure that is initialized with 2D texture values.

param.name: pTex2D
param.para: A pointer to a ID3D11Texture2D interface for a 2D texture.

param.name: viewDimension
param.para: A D3D11_UAV_DIMENSION-typed value that specifies the resource type of the view.

param.name: format
param.para: A DXGI_FORMAT-typed value that specifies the viewing format.

param.name: mipSlice
param.para: The index of the mipmap level to use mip slice.

param.name: firstArraySlice
param.para: The index of the first element to use in an array of elements.

param.name: arraySize
param.para: Number of elements in the array.

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_UNORDERED_ACCESS_VIEW_DESC structure that is initialized with 3D texture values.

param.name: pTex3D
param.para: A pointer to a ID3D11Texture3D interface for a 3D texture.

param.name: format
param.para: A DXGI_FORMAT-typed value that specifies the viewing format.

param.name: mipSlice
param.para: The index of the mipmap level to use mip slice.

param.name: firstWSlice
param.para: First depth level to use.

param.name: wSize
param.para: Number of depth levels to use in the render-target view, starting from firstWSlice. A value of -1 indicates all of the slices along the w axis, starting from firstWSlice.

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of an uninitialized CD3D11_UNORDERED_ACCESS_VIEW_DESC structure.
